rows.label: tev000994_MSG0001
rows.name: ......[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000994_MSG0003
rows.name: Is that you, [ST:playername ]?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000994_MSG0004
rows.name: I'd not expected to encounter you here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000994_MSG0005
rows.name: When I'm not on duty, I come here to meditate.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000994_MSG0006
rows.name:
I set my entire being to the goal of finding wisdom,
but such a thing is not so easily attained.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000994_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: tev000994_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Bozé about his religious outlook.

rows.label: tev000994_JNK0020
rows.name: Chide

rows.label: tev000994_SEL0021
rows.name: Explain that churches aren't for meditation—temples are.

rows.label: tev000994_MSG0007
rows.name:
Hmm. I'll take that question to mean "how did you end
up becoming so strangely pious?"[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000994_MSG0008
rows.name:
My religious journey began many decades ago,
on my first mission as a platoon leader in Asia.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000994_MSG0009
rows.name:
Led astray by bad intel, my platoon was isolated in the
jungle and eventually overrun.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000994_MSG0010
rows.name:
A girl from a nearby village found me at the brink of
death and saved my life.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000994_MSG0011
rows.name: And there, I learned the most wonderful lesson...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000994_MSG0012
rows.name:
It began with learning how to make a basic rice
porridge.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000994_MSG0013
rows.name:
It's a simple but powerful food, and one with the
power to change lives. It certainly returned me to life.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000994_MSG0014
rows.name: But what happened after that, you ask?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000994_MSG0015
rows.name:
On the 22nd day after my platoon was ambushed,
they came for me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000994_MSG0016
rows.name:
Just as I finished saying my farewells and the helicopter
lifted into the air...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000994_MSG0017
rows.name: It was hit by a rocket.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000994_MSG0018
rows.name:
...And so, it wasn't until the 49th day that I was finally
reunited with the army.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000994_MSG0019
rows.name: And after that...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000994_MSG0020
rows.name: ...And that's how I came to be here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000994_MSG0021
rows.name:
Admittedly, I omitted several decades there.
But I believe I was able to convey the gist of it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000994_MSG0022
rows.name:
If you'd like to know more, come speak with me again.
Next time I'll fill in a few of the blanks.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000994_MSG0023
rows.name: I shall await you, O seeker of knowledge.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000994_MSG0024
rows.name:
True, churches are generally not considered appropriate
places to meditate.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000994_MSG0025
rows.name: However, I have yet to discover a temple in New LA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000994_MSG0026
rows.name:
Some people prefer to meditate under large trees,
but I don't believe New LA has any of those, either.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000994_MSG0027
rows.name:
And if I were to attempt to meditate outside of the city,
I'd awaken from it in the belly of some indigen.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000994_MSG0028
rows.name:
So to put it simply, this is the best place I've found to
meditate on this planet.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000994_MSG0029
rows.name:
But that is enough for today. I'm heading back to the
barracks to get myself some breakfast.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000994_MSG0030
rows.name:
And there is no finer way to break one's fast than with
a meal of boiled tofu and salsa![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000994_MSG0031
rows.name: If you'd like to join me, you're certainly welcome.[ST:wait ]
